ComicInfo.Title: Robot Peace; Supermarket Stock Boy; Get Off It Already!; Cracked Look at Young Sherlock Holmes; Knit Ladder; What's the Beef?; Rock 'n; Roll Losers!!; Death Wishy-Washy 3!; Man's First Attempts to Harness the Power of Electricity; Jailbreak to Mermaid; Hazardous to Your Health!; The High Lama; Rockey IV; Let The Punishment Fit the Crime!; Tricks Are for Kids!; Cracked Interviews Dick Clog the Blooper & Practical Joke King; Merlin Calling... Collect!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Three robots merge into a single giant robot to fight back against their foe. He easily destroys the giant robot with a single punch.
Hudd and Dini knit a ladder to escape prison but the guard has been knitting a net to catch them.
Cavemen have already built an electric toaster and are trying to switch it on by holding the cable into the air during a lightning storm.
Hudd and Dini break out of a jail and see a mermaid but she's a prison guard in disguise.
A man seeks out the high lama to learn how to live a long and happy life but forgets that as they're in the mountains he shouldn't raise his voice.
Tired of being told Zix cereal is only for kids a rabbit steals some but it makes him sick.
Merlin makes a collect call. The man at the other end refuses the charges so Merlin turns him into a frog.
